PHRASE.LANG: Lead guitarist, Spazz, plays a mean guitar solo to go along with his studded shoulder-pads. Bundle includes headdress, top, legs, and boots. [#Legal]
Guitariste principal, Spazz joue des solos de guitare à l'image de ses épaulettes à clous. Ce pack inclut une coiffure, un top, un pantalon et des bottes. [#Legal]
Leadgitarrist Spazz spielt ein wildes Gitarrensolo, das zu seinen mit Nieten besetzten Schulterpolstern passt. Das Paket umfasst Kopf, Oberkörper, Beine und Schuhe. [#Legal]
Spazz, chitarrista solista, suona un cattivissimo assolo, adeguato ai suoi coprispalle borchiati. Il pacchetto include acconciatura, busto, pantaloni e stivali. [#Legal]
Los fabulosos solos del guitarrasta principal, Spazz, hacen juego con sus hombreras de remaches. El conjunto comprende tocado, torso, pantalones y botas. [#Legal]
Lead guitarist, Spazz, plays a mean guitar solo to go along with his studded shoulder-pads. Bundle includes headdress, top, pants, and boots. [#Legal]
